scenarios

Class Scenario

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenarios.Scenario
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbandonedCargo, AbandonedShip, Asteroid, BlackHole, Fire, FoodPoisoning, Mutiny, PitStop, Raid, ScientificBreakthrough

    public abstract class Scenario
extends java.lang.Object
    Scenario class - abstract class for all scenarios. Scenarios are random situations that occur during the game. Each scenario has a different action that may require the user to do something, or the scenario will simply play out by itself. They may help or delay the spaceship in its mission to Pluto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Scenario(java.lang.String d)
      Constructor to initialize description of scenario and lists of food and equipment for some scenarios that require an addition or remove of a random object

    • Method Summary

      consequence method - abstract method that displays the results of that scenario.
      java.lang.String toString()
      toString method returns the description of the scenario

      • consequence

        public abstract void consequence(Spaceship myShip)
        consequence method - abstract method that displays the results of that scenario. Consequences remove or damage existing items in spaceship or add items and money to it
